## Loading the data


```{r, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
load("house_elections.rda")
load("candidates.rda")
load("committees.rda")
load("contributions.rda")
```

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```
##Tidying Data

```{r}
cmte_by_party <- function(party_arg) {
  committees %>%
    group_by(cmte_city) %>%
    filter(cmte_party_affiliation == party_arg) %>%
    select(cmte_name, cmte_dsgn, cmte_city, cmte_state, connected_org_name)
}

democratic_cmte <- cmte_by_party("DEM")
republican_cmte <- cmte_by_party("REP")
teaparty_cmte <- cmte_by_party("TEA")

incumbents <- house_elections %>%
  filter(incumbent == "TRUE") %>%
  select(candidate_name, party, general_votes, ge_winner, state, incumbent)

```
